firewall: Na-enyocha okporo ụzọ netwọkụ dabere na usoro iwu
nje: Akụrụngwa ọjọọ emebere iji megharịa na gbasaa
malware: Okwu sara mbara gụnyere nje, ikpuru, Trojans, wdg.
phishing: Ozi ịntanetị aghụghọ na-anwa ịghọgbu ndị ọrụ inye ozi
ransomware: Malware na-ezochi faịlụ, na-achọ ịkwụ ụgwọ maka nbipu
izo ya ezo: Usoro nke scrambling data iji mee ka ọ ghara ịgụ ya na-enweghị igodo
decryption: Usoro nke iweghachite data ezoro ezo azụ na ụdị enwere ike ịgụ
ad\u1ecbgh\u1ecb ike: Adịghị ike na ngwanrọ ma ọ bụ sistemụ enwere ike irigbu
irigbu: Koodu ma ọ bụ usoro na-eji ohere adịghị ike
imebi data: Nweta ma ọ bụ mwepụta ozi na-enweghị ikike
nyocha ihe ab\u1ee5\u1ecd: Achọrọ mpempe nkwenye ọzọ gafere paswọọdụ
injinia mmek\u1ecdr\u1ecbta mmad\u1ee5 n: Ịghọta ndị mmadụ n'ịhapụ ozi nzuzo
ule ntinye: Mwakpo simulated enyere ikike ịchọta adịghị ike na sistemụ
\u1ecdg\u1ee5 \u1ee5b\u1ecdch\u1ecb efu: Na-erigbu adịghị ike nke onye na-ere ngwanrọ na-amaghị
botnet: Netwọk kọmputa ndị butere ọrịa nke onye mwakpo na-achịkwa
\u1ecbg\u1ecdnar\u1ecb mbuso agha \u1ecd: Na-eju sistemu nwere okporo ụzọ ka ọ ghara ịdị
njikwa ohere: Ijikwa onye ma ọ bụ ihe nwere ikike maka akụrụngwa
usoro nch\u1ecdp\u1ee5ta intrusion: Na-enyocha netwọkụ ma ọ bụ sistemu maka ọrụ enwetaghị ikike
nzaghachi meren\u1ee5: Usoro a na-esote mgbe ihe nchekwa mere
nyocha ihe Egwu: Ịmata na nyochaa ihe egwu na adịghị ike nwere ike ime
njikwa kwachie: Usoro nke itinye mmelite iji dozie adịghị ike
ndabere: Ịmepụta otu data iji chebe megide ọnwụ
mgbake \u1ecddachi: Mee atụmatụ iweghachi sistemu na arụ ọrụ mgbe emeghasịchara
dijital\u1ee5 forensics: Nyocha na nyocha nke ihe akaebe dijitalụ
